Below this, there is a Google search bar, and at the bottom of the screen is a dock with five icons, likely representing commonly used apps: Google Photos, Google Messages, YouTube, Google Chrome, and Gmail. The navigation bar at the very bottom includes a back button, home button, and a multitasking button.
